text: Hey <@U0695UMTM2M>, it's coming from HubSpot API. So the form is filled on our website and that's the data that HS is passing via the API. Hope that helps? :slightly_smiling_face:

Finally have another example <@U0695UMTM2M>:

```{"name":"Solid brass hammered cabinet handle","id":"42498","slug":"solid-brass-hammered-cabinet-handle","quantity":"1","product_code":"CH1067"}```
Not so much data in this one.  Adding different product parameters before submitting the enquiry provides more data, as does enquiring after more products.

That’s what I am doing now as well, but I was wondering if it would be possible to call the function before you end the workflow - which was just a lazy implementation from my side. I think we’re already doing the right thing. Thanks!
yea - callback is going to end execution of the function wherever it’s called.
And you want to put this into the conversation history with a contact?
Yes, please, I'd like it to be logged as conversion activity

Hey partners,

In the new workflows interface, you can now search for an action, which helpfully brings up suggested apps...

Does anyone have data to see how many people are using the search feature and if 'Workflow SEO' is going to be a thing? :eyes:
Any luck with this <@U04T2CUCP8T> ? This is exactly what we need and HubSpot’s support says they can’t help.
